title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 362.4 - Capital construction projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 362.4 - Capital construction projects

State Regulations

With respect to future capital construction projects which
may have a significant effect upon the environment, all applicable provisions
of SEQR and Part 617 of Title 6 will be followed by the
department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
362.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
